reviewText: Ok, this dvd suffers A LOT from the sophisticated point of view, as it is very simply done, amaturely recorded, etc. But it is so much fun. You feel sexy and coordinated and you actually sweat a lot doing it. With practice, the bellydance routine at the end is really fun and looks cool, too. Don't get me wrong, I still only do it in private with the doors locked, but still... I highly recommend it for someone interested in trying bellydancing!
